objects.description: [Cinnamon Tempest](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1021) has used search order hijacking to launch [Cobalt Strike](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0154) Beacons.(Citation: Microsoft Ransomware as a Service)(Citation: SecureWorks BRONZE STARLIGHT Ransomware Operations June 2022) [Cinnamon Tempest](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1021) has also abused legitimate executables to side-load weaponized DLLs.(Citation: Sygnia Emperor Dragonfly October 2022)
